#Main page

= Introduction =

Light and shade is a real-time strategy game involving two players.


== Components ==

 * AI-controlled player
  * Dark player
 * Human-controlled player
  * Light player
 * Level generator
 * Light system

==Mechanics==

 * Light/dark Behavior
 * Push/pull (manipulation)

==General behaviors==
 * Pathfinding
 * Obstacle avoidance
